name: Avid Multimedia, Inc.
description: Avid Multimedia, Inc. is a leading technology company specialized in audio and video production solutions. Established in 1987, Avid has become synonymous with high-quality media production and is a trusted partner for creative professionals in the film, television, and music industries. The company's flagship products include the Avid Media Composer, a powerful video editing software used in Hollywood, and Pro Tools, an industry-standard digital audio workstation that revolutionizes music and sound production. Avid's innovative technology enables users to create, collaborate, and distribute high-quality content efficiently. The company is committed to driving creativity and collaboration through its cloud-based solutions and integrated tools that streamline workflows and enhance productivity. Avid also provides educational resources and training programs to empower the next generation of media creators. With a strong focus on innovation, Avid continues to shape the future of media production and distribution, making it an essential player in the digital content landscape.

faq.answer: Jeff Rosica is the CEO of Avid Multimedia, Inc.

faq.answer: Avid is headquartered in Burlington, Massachusetts, USA.

faq.answer: Avid's main products include Pro Tools and Media Composer.
